en_us: Get blinded by an underwater squid
Glow due to an underwater glow squid
Improves the vanilla ink effect by adding Blindness. Glow Squid will give Night Vision when disturbed, which might come in handy if you're out of torches!
Swimming underwater near a squid will cause it to ink the diver.\n\nWhen affected by squid ink, blindness and nausea effects occur.
When glow squids ink, they have the opposite effect from squids.\n\nThose inked with glow ink are affected by night vision and glowing.
